resources.string:
License and Information

This program is Free/Libre Open-Source Software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. See www.gnu.org/licenses

This app is based on \'Flym RSS Reader\', copyright 2013–2016 Frédéric Julian. Among features added to this fork are:

• feed group expanding
• invisible fullscreen page up|down buttons
• max image per feed download count
• ability to cancel refresh process
• and much more

You Can Find Us at:

• our website (news and info)
• Google Play Store
• F-Droid
• XDA forum
• GitHub

Our Support

If you stumble upon a problem with the app, You can:

• check if that problem has been addressed within our FAQ
• open an issue on GitHub issues page
• email the developer

Your Support

If you have an idea for a new feature you can:

• open an issue on GitHub issues page
• email the developer

If you find this app useful please rate it at Google Play

You can also make a donation (link at the end of the description)

Translations

You can help in translation to your own language at Crowdin If your language isn\'t available then please send an e-mail to the developer

Acknowledgments

Developers:

***developerList***

Translators:

***translatorList***
Welcome to Handy Reading. Would you like to add a feed?
To be able to import or export the feeds and app settings from or to a file, you must allow the application to access to the storage memory
The feed can not be processed
The selected file could not be imported
Export has failed. Make sure you have a writable SD-card mounted
The external storage (e.g., SD-card) is not available
Do you really want to delete this feed?
Do you really want to delete this group and all of its feeds?
Do you really want to delete this filter?
Would You like to put this feed inside or outside this group?
Add a custom feed or search for one
Show original text on article list
No application found for this link
Tip: swipe right to mark as read, swipe left to add to Favorites
\u201cWhen you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That\'s relativity.\u201d\n(Albert Einstein)
Automatic refresh and time to keep articles
Refreshes all feeds after opening the application
Automatic refresh will only be done if Wi-Fi connection is available
During refresh operation do not load articles with date older than this duration
(in KB). Do not auto load images larger than
The refresh will stop when traffic reaches max value (in MB) and is not over WiFi
Turn off to gain more space of the screen
Show Mark all articles as read button - otherwise You will find this option in menu
Show small checkbox to indicate that article has been read
Show small diskette icon to indicate that article full text has been loaded
Little plus icon on new articles (which had never be seen).
Displays the current time at the top right corner in fullscreen mode
Text size of the additional information
Height and width of all Tap Zones in millimeters
Check this to adjust the brightness by swiping up/down along the left edge of the screen
Enable the vibration on new articles
Enable notification light on new articles
(By tap on the top|bottom of the screen) To preserve several lines from the previous page - if unchecked, the whole page will be scrolled
Open the last viewed article on startup, otherwise unread articles list
Auto remove the article from Favorites when the article bottom has been reached
Additional features (such as backup, filters and more)
To periodically save Your feeds and favorite articles list into a backup file
Color and transparency of the widget background

Each line is a rule that allows for a specific site to set the name of the HTML class, with which the full text of the article begins (basic knowledge of HTML is required), so as not to include unnecessary elements in the text of the article. This setting is automatically updated in the article content editing mode
Set for each site (base HTML knowledge needed)
page up (long tap - to top)or\nswipe down to (un)star
Show detailed info about current operation (during article refresh, image downloading, article text opening etc)
On article list and in article text window while starring
The article has been removed from Favorites
The article has been added to Favorites
The article has been marked as unread
The article has been marked as starred:
A filter\'s action will be initiated if at least one condition (rule) is met. \'Accept\' overrides \'Reject\'

string.font: (load all links from page as different articles)

string.name: loadTypeOneWebPage
string.font: (divide one web page content into many articles using HTML tags class names)

resources.string: A filter that apply to every feed

How often a backup file will be created
otherwise select .opml file to import - out of feedex folder only (via inner dialog). Disabled in Android 10+
Tip: to save the current color make a long tap on one of the cells
Color was saved to the cell
Unlike others, these rules are set for all sites. Each line contains only the class name
Class name per line. The elements of these classes are considered as date of article the feeds of type Web Page - Links
(in minutes, 0 = off) After this time span the brightness level will be adjusted to the current system level (by swipe)
Create a shortcut on Home Screen
New shortcut has been created on Home Screen

(empty - use default) path for feedex folder to store downloaded images and backup
allows to tap on article title to open it in a web-browser
regardless of the articles keep time
Where to store downloaded articles text and images

if unchecked, the full text won\'t be reloaded after each tag editing (show|hide|root), so You can introduce multiple changes easier (in such a case you need to manually reload full text once You finish the editing)
When Action Bar is hidden - otherwise You\'ll find the menu only on the Action Bar
New article shortcut has been created on Home Screen
on Tap Zones and in non-link areas

Also during the Delete old operation calculate and show loaded images sum size on storage per article, feed, group, etc. These numbers are updated during deletion of the old articles - so the operation duration could be significantly enlarged
How often check and delete old (including already read) articles
This color is used for in-article buttons and for the status bar

Hint: in this load type the web page content is divided into articles by HTML elements class name from feed settings. You should also set the class names for article title, date and image URL. To find the required class names you should load that page (Read now) and switch to the Edit Content View where you can find and copy class names for required elements
Date (may be several, sep. by space)
Next page class name (for recursive load)
Persistent status bar notification to prevent app from being killed by system - to speed up app starting after long delay
For the article text and the article list screens.
Orientation and visibility of the buttons at the end of an article
To keep app in memory to speed up cold start
Auto set the article as read once its title has been visible on the list
Reset feed and delete non-starred articles
Choose a part of the URL to use as a key for the rule
Regex (one per line) applied to any article content
The day of month and a weekday
This will remove ALL existing articles from ALL feeds (except “Read It Later”), even starred. Are you sure?
Ohh… I was wrong. Get me out of here quick!
Font family of almost all texts in app. You can add custom font ttf files by select the bottom item in font list

To set custom fonts for separate classes in article texts per domain. Leave class name empty to apply font to whole text. Format: site_url:class=Font file name=CSS text (e.g., font-weight: 400; font-size: 12; letter-spacing: 0.1em)
site_url:class=Font file name=CSS text. For example: font-weight: 400; font-size: 12; letter-spacing: 0.1em

"Class name where to find article main image to use it as article icon and to insert it im the beginning of the article (instead of og:image) per domain. This can helps if the article image is outside of the full text article section "
The HTML class names to help the to find different article parts. Some of these settings automatically updated in article edit content view mode

(1-100) The count of operations executed simultaneously during the article refresh. The smaller the value, the less CPU activity and memory consumption during the refresh. The bigger, the faster it is. Optimal value depends on the count of the device CPU cores
to set font weight, letter spacing, etc., for article text
This text is visible only when status bar is hidden
UNSTAR ALL visible STARRED articles. Are you sure?
All visible starred articles will be unstarred. Are you REALLY sure?
All tap actions were temporary disabled! Tap top right to enable
Zoom and scroll actions were disabled
Zoom and scroll actions were enabled
An article has not been found :(
In kB for horizontal indicator (0 to turn off). It\'s hidden for feeds with Auto mark articles as read feed option enabled
Force portrait screen orientation in Edit Feed window - check if your phone has narrow screen
You can use pattern for the current date {…} in URL, e.g., http://test.org/{yyyy-MM-dd} . The date format rules are described here: https://developer.android.com/reference/java/text/SimpleDateFormat
Rules for finding article comments sections
File %s copied to %s subfolder of Downloads
Label setup by tap on date
Author and URL in the article list
A video tag was found in the article text
Temporary disable tap action in the article abstract text when it contains a video
The url seems to be a telegram one. Do you want to auto setup feed settings for telegram channel?
Sort labels alphabetically. Otherwise manual sorting
Sort feeds and groups alphabetically. Otherwise manual sorting
Key word or web site url
"Show remaining page count to scroll to bottom "
An error coured during operation. Send it to developer?
Show several first lines of article text
The show image app that will be used directly, to do not waste time on system app select dialog
The browser app that will be used directly, to do not waste time on system app select dialog
Check this if you experience certificate problems with loading web content. !!! ATTENTION !!! This can make your device insecure :(
In mills. How long should we wait for internet connection
Could not create subfolder in Downloads
An ability to expand article text in article list. If checked all tap actions except on article title expand or collapse article text instead of opening article in separate window

Appearance of feed list and last read section settings
Text which will be included in any article html CSS section. With this you can customize the format of the article text in any way. See https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_intro.asp for beginning
Show full screen width aritcle image instead of small icon
Margins (in mm) of left and right edges to fight screen round corners"
Select all feeds for auto refresh
Remove auto refresh checkbox from all feeds
Show navigation bar in full screen mode
Show small empty star icon to indicate that article is not in favorites
Suggest to send a mail with debug info to developer when app crashes
Do you want to import feeds and app settings from auto backup file?
The maximum additional programmatic brightness dim value (0-no additional dim, 100 - full darkness)

The items of this global filter are added to any feed filter. Reject items of global filter exclude triggered articles from web search results. This screen is also accessible by long tap on All, Unread, Favorites, Last read or Without feed items in feed list)
Show system setup dialog for the app notifications
Show toast message when backup file successfully was copied to Downloads
Remove found categories from article text
There will be only default action when an article has video
Force orientation by sensor to override system settings
To what position scroll the article list when its first opened
